Description:
Every Pioneer deserves a Roof over their head and factory. Get this basic human need now for only 6 Coupons!

Once unlocked, Roof Materials will become available for purchase in the Customizer section of the AWESOME Shop. Do not miss out on those special looks!
New research has shown that repetitive Roof aesthetics reduce Pioneer efficiency. Solve your productivity issues today, with these versatile Roof Corner pieces!
Ever wanted to admire your factories from a safe and convenient place? Build some Walkways and get inspired by your own labour to do even better!
Ever wanted to admire your factories from a safe and convenient place? Build some Walkways and get inspired by your own labour to do even better!
Adds the Asphalt Foundation Material to the Customizer, from where it can be applied to any Foundation or Ramp.
Adds the Concrete Foundation Material to the Customizer, from where it can be applied to any Foundation or Ramp.
Adds the Grip Metal Foundation Material to the Customizer, from where it can be applied to any Foundation or Ramp.
Adds the Coated Concrete Foundation Material to the Customizer, from where it can be applied to any Foundation or Ramp.
Adds the Concrete Wall Material to the Customizer, from where it can be applied to any Wall.
Adds the Steel Wall Material to the Customizer, from where it can be applied to any Wall.
Adds the Glass Roof Material to the Customizer, from where it can be applied to any Roof.
Adds the Steel Roof Material to the Customizer, from where it can be applied to any Roof.
Adds the Tar Roof Material to the Customizer, from where it can be applied to any Roof.
How did you even figure out how to get this? Whatever... You deserve it.
Worried about your superfluous body needs interrupting your work? We're proud to provide our pioneers with the means to stay efficient! Get your Coffee Cup! (Coffee not included).
This limited edition cup is only awarded to those Pioneers who have completed the last available stage of Project Assembly in its 'early design stage'.

Boost your efficiency now, with the completely unnecessary FICSIT Boombox!

*Tapes are sold separately.

The most efficient music in the universe.

Boombox Tapes are automatically added to the Boombox when obtained.

22 minutes and 47 seconds of goat-fi beats to chill/ eat grass to.

By goats, for goats.

Boombox Tapes are automatically added to the Boombox when obtained.

The only music that can legally be listened to while driving around in a FICSIT Factory Cart™.
Anything else is in direct violation of FICSIT Code of Conduct section J-0 paragraph 3-L and will result in eventual extinguishment.

Boombox Tapes are automatically added to the Boombox when obtained.

The tape that doesn't need an introduction.

Boombox Tapes are automatically added to the Boombox when obtained.
Boombox Tapes are automatically added to the Boombox when obtained.
Boombox Tapes are automatically added to the Boombox when obtained.
Never again will you build a Ramp one step at a time. Take over the world efficiently, increase your productivity and enjoy building in diagonal with the new Double Ramps!

Are the regular Foundations too big for your needs? Want to keep some space in your floor for Conveyor Lifts?
Introducing: Half Foundations! Only half the size, for the full price!
Bring your Quarter Pipes to new heights, or simply add rounded accents to your factory design, with the brand new special Quarter Pipe Extensions.
Never again will a wall stop you from swooping through your factory. With the new next-gen Hypertube Wall Hole included in this pack, speed has no limits!
This clean version of the Mk.1 Pipeline does not feature the external fluid indicator, sacrificing feedback for style.
This clean version of the Mk.2 Pipeline does not feature the external fluid indicator, sacrificing feedback for style.
Tired of bulky power poles? Save space and organize an efficient power grid in your factory with the all new and revolutionary Power Outlets for walls and ceilings!
Tired of bulky power poles? Save space and organize an efficient power grid in your factory with the all new and revolutionary Power Outlets for walls and ceilings!
Tired of bulky power poles? Save space and organize an efficient power grid in your factory with the all new and revolutionary Power Outlets for walls and ceilings!
Ceiling Lights are the perfect choice for indoor illumination. Simply attach them to the ceiling, hook up power, and watch your conveyor belts shine bright even in the darkest of factories.

Specifically designed to illuminate outdoor areas, the Flood Lights are the perfect choice for lighting up construction sites or outposts. Their height makes them tower over even the largest of buildings. And for additional convenience the Wall version can be placed on any wall, for indoor settings or if more precise light placement is required.
No more night-time related walkway accidents involving Trucks and poor lighting conditions! Light up those pathways and roads using the FICSIT Street Lights!
Space dilation is still in the R&D phase at FICSIT research facilities. It's not yet recommended to try walking through walls. Purchase a Door today for safe factory traversal!
Are you up for the challenge? Show your worth with this recognition efforts and proudly showcase it in your factory if you're really sure you deserve it.
It's a Golden Nut. It's shiny and its price is totally justified. Don't overthink it, you need one! Purchase a Golden Nut today! (Warning: Ingestion is not recommended).
You love Doggos but are not of the responsible breed? Worry not! Purchase the Golden Lizard Doggo today and enjoy cuteness without worrying about it starving!
